data.title: Shaub, Paul · The Joy of Collecting: The Strishock Print Collection · Digital Exhibits
data.meta_description: American Catholic History Research Center and University Archives
data.text:
Paul Shaub (1923- ) Born in 1923 in Steelton, PA, Shaub has had works exhibited at the Smithsonian and The Mystic Seaport Museum of America and the Sea. He is known for his etchings, serigraphs, lithographs, and woodcuts. Records of the Smithsonian indicate that he may have been a member of the International Graphic Arts Society, Inc.

Resources Cited:

Smithsonian American Art Museum

http://americanart.si.edu/collections/search/artwork/?id=22238

Biographical information found with print, information written by Arthur Flory.
